https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=65b7841b60341e32,indeed,"Lead Data Engineer - Research & Analytics, Infrastructure",APG,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Apg-877e77fe,"Amsterdam, NH, NL","parttime, fulltime",2024-07-22,,,,,False,,,"thomas.vander.meij@apg-am.nl, roy.tholen@apg.nl, thomas.vander.meij@apg-am.nl, roy.tholen@apg.nl","**APG Asset Management Amsterdam is looking to hire a Data Engineering Lead to join the Infrastructure team.**
Locatie
Amsterdam
Dienstverband
Jaren ervaring
5-8 jaar werkervaring
Opleidingsniveau
Master / WO
Publicatiedatum
22 juli 2024
### **Dit wordt je functie**
**Functieomschrijving**

Together with the lead Research & Analytics Infrastructure, the role is a pivotal element in both the development of a global Infrastructure Analytics platform and the regional investment process for the European Infrastructure portfolio.

This Analytics platform enables efficient bottom up research on private infrastructure investments, providing new insights and ensuring that we are able to integrate all relevant (big) data sources into our decision-making. The role is a unique opportunity to contribute to a fast growing platform that is instrumental in the investment decision process.

The lead data engineer has a strong focus on building the foundation for a more data driven approach to asset management. The data platform and accompanying data products enable our portfolio managers to invest responsibly and efficiently. The lead data engineer will be part of the investment team to support the value-creation and growth of the c.€26bn infrastructure portfolio. This is an ideal role for candidates with a quantitative background that have affinity with the infrastructure market. It offers the opportunity to help shape the business as we grow.
**Dit ga je doen**
**Main Duties and Responsibilities:**
* Working with the lead research and analytics to develop the global infrastructure analytics platform
* Leading the data engineering efforts in the research and analytics team to further develop the global infrastructure analytics platform
* Further professionalize data pipelines, the knowledge graph and analytical tools that are built on top of these
* Perform thematic research with a quantitative angle on relevant topics to assess impact on underwriting of the investment portfolio
* Turn the research into deployed data products with minimal maintenance.
**Dit breng je mee**
**Job Requirements:**
* A Master’s degree or higher with high distinction in quantitative methods, mathematics, or other statistical/data oriented emphasis from a top-tier school
* A minimum of 5 years of relevant experience in data engineering and analytics.
* Advanced coding skills in Python
* Experience with large-language models, knowledge graphs or BI tools such as MS PowerBI is a plus
* Value creation mindset over the long term - broad minded, innovative, forward thinker
* Strong team player and communicator with the ability to collaborate effectively with internal and external stakeholders
* Adaptable and able to apply themselves to a broad range of demands
* Excellent English communication skills
* Willing to undertake regional travel.
**Dit bieden wij**
**What APG has to offer**
We offer you a competitive monthly salary based on 40-hours and attractive terms of employment with a
focus on flexibility.
* A guaranteed year-end bonus of 8.33%
* A target driven bonus scheme
* Ample attention to your vitality and personal development
* Ability to grow your professional network, internally as well as externally
* Working from home for 2 to 3 days, and also working from one of our beautiful offices
* And of course a well-organized pension.
For pension provider APG, pensions are about people, life and how we live together. Through careful asset
management, pension administration, communication and advice, APG wants to help building a decent
future in which we share our well-being and prosperity honestly and sustainably. For present and future
generations. For today, tomorrow and beyond.
APG is committed to serving 4.7 million people in the Netherlands. That explains the importance we attach
to reflecting Dutch society. To that end, APG strives for an inclusive work environment in which everyone
can be themselves and their unique qualities are embraced.
Choosing APG means choosing a job in which you contribute to a bright future. Don’t delay, apply today! **Meer informatie**
**More information**

For more information please feel free to reach out to Thomas van der Meij. You can contact him via the following e-mail address: thomas.vander.meij@apg-am.nl. If you have any other question, please contact our recruiter Roy Tholen, roy.tholen@apg.nl.
A Pre-Employment Screening is part of the procedure.

**Job Mission**
As a Mechanical Design Engineer you are responsible for the development and application of mechanical designs to meet system specifications and operational requirements.
**Job Description**

As a Mechanical Design Engineer you are responsible for specification, design, realization and tests of mechanical modules, main frame constructions and service mechanisms, ensuring to meet the requirements in terms of safety, reliability, stability, contamination, cost effectiveness, manufacturability and serviceability, all within the constraints of costs and planning.
* Translate performance specifications into design specification for main frame constructions and service mechanisms.
* Based upon specification create concepts, designs, drawings including realization and qualification of your design.
* Uses state of the art design methods and construction principles to ensure adequate designs that can be realized from a technical and supply chain perspective.
* Validate concepts and designs by calculations and FEM analysis.
* Drive the quality of the design by well-balanced concept and design decisions and defining tests including test equipment.
* Supplier contact for reviews of designs and drawings on manufacturability.
* Ensure that prototypes are built and tests are carried out.
* Deliver the technical product documentation that is needed to release the design for volume production.
**Educational Level**
Technical University Masters or Bachelor in Mechanical engineering
**Experience**
* Minimum of 7 years of experience in a development and engineering organization. Preference with design experience of supporting structures and service mechanisms.
* Preferred 3 years ASML design experience.
* Excellent knowledge of design principles for precision mechanics and of designing on stiffness.
* Experience in the field manufacturability of precision mechanical parts.
* 3D CAD modeling (preferably NX).
* Experience with design simulation (FEM) and analytic tools.
**Personal Skills**
* Strong analytical ability with a pragmatic attitude
* Critical on results and quality
* Creative thinking capability
* Good communication skills
* Good knowledge of English
* Ability to work in an international multicultural setting.
* Flexible and open mindset, anticipating on a challenging and dynamic environment.
* Eager to drive own development.
**Sector Information**

Within ASML the sector Development & Engineering is responsible for the specification and the design of the ASML products. The department Mechanical Development is designing, building and testing mechanical systems and sub-systems which are fitted into the end products. As a part of the MDEV EUV Mechanical Architecture department the group Mechanical Constructions Source is responsible for engineering of Vacuum Vessel- and support frame constructions, position and service mechanisms, tools, Source to Scanner connection modules.
**Other information**
If you apply to this position - please include a recent and complete CV, a letter of motivation and preferably a portfolio in which you showcase relevant work done.

https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=cf679536498b15a3,indeed,Werkvoorbereider,VDL Groep,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Vdl-Groep,"Dirksland, ZH, NL",,2024-07-19,,,,,False,,,,"Een enthousiaste collega gezocht met technische kennis die ons team komt versterken!**Wat ga je doen?**

Wij zijn op zoek naar een vakkundige project engineer voor onze opdrachtgevers, welke voor een optimaal verloop van de werkvoorbereiding van onze assemblage-opdrachten en NPI’s (New Product Introductions) zorgt door gehele processen te begeleiden van technische realiseerbaarheid van het aangevraagde product tot aan het vertalen daarvan naar de betreffende afdelingen.

Een greep uit de werkzaamheden: Het betreft een dynamische, zelfstandige en technische functie binnen de open sfeer van ons familiebedrijf. Een functie waarin je eindverantwoordelijk bent voor het goed verloop van de opdrachten, doelmatigheid en kwaliteit. Ben jij een technisch talent met opleiding en ervaring op het gebied van elektronica en weet jij afdelingen bij elkaar te brengen om te komen tot het gezamenlijk te bereiken gewenste resultaat?
**Jouw profiel**
* Opleiding MBO/HBO in technische richting, bij voorkeur elektrotechniek
* Aantal jaar relevante commercieel technische werkervaring
* Mondelinge en schriftelijke communicatieve vaardigheden
* Inzicht in productieprocessen, planning en life-cycle management
* Proactieve instelling
* Gedreven in (kwaliteit)oordeelsvorming
* Oplossings- en resultaatgericht met gevoel voor commercie
* Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift
* Projectbegeleider in hart en nieren met technische kennis en verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel.
**Kun je je vinden in wat wij jou bieden?**
* Een informele, dynamische omgeving met een variëteit aan collega's, die voor elkaar klaar staan
* We zitten op een goed bereikbare, filevrije locatie
* Er is veel ruimte voor verdere ontwikkeling middels o.a. cursussen en opleidingen
* Doorgroeimogelijkheden
* Marktconform salaris (afhankelijk van opleiding, leeftijd en ervaring) en pensioenregeling binnen de CAO Metalektro
* 27 vakantiedagen & 13 ADV-dagen
* 8% vakantiegeld
* Recht op winstuitkering
* Voordelen van corporate benefits (kortingen)
* Reiskostenvergoeding.
**Interesse?**

Is je interesse gewekt en voldoe je aan het profiel? Dan ontvangen we graag jouw cv en motivatie voor deze vacature! Wij nodigen geschikte kandidaten graag uit voor een oriënterend gesprek in ons gezellige Grand Café.
*Het overleggen van een VOG maakt onderdeel uit van de sollicitatieprocedure.*
*Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld.*
**Bedrijfsinformatie**

Als electronics manufacturing services (EMS)-onderneming biedt VDL TBP Electronics geïntegreerde services aan op het gebied van printed circuit board assemblies (pcba’s). Opdrachtgevers profiteren van de hoogste productwaarde en best value of ownership. Dit dankzij ontwerpoptimalisatie op het gebied van maakbaarheid, testbaarheid, leverflexibiliteit en kosten, met als resultaat maximaal productierendement en maximale kwaliteit. Onze medewerkers genieten van een dynamische werkomgeving, ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden, en een bedrijfscultuur gedreven door samenwerking en kwaliteit.

Onze kracht zit in de betrokkenheid in het vroegste ontwerpstadium met onze early supplier involvement, Design for eXcellence (DfX), Design for Manufacturing (DfM), Design for Testing (DfT), Design for Circularity (DfC), Design for Logistics (DfL) en Design for Cost (DfC). Ook zijn wij specialist in supply chain management, test engineering, smart industry en cabinettenbouw. Met meer dan 170 medewerkers staan wij al sinds 1976 klaar voor opdrachtgevers in uiteenlopende sectoren:
* Energy & Industry
* Science & Health

**What sets us apart**

We are committed to innovation and to a nurturing work environment. Founded by developers and researchers, we spend a lot of time actively reviewing the latest trends in generative AI and software engineering. Known for pioneering AI technologies, we dive deep into cutting-edge research to create not only translations, but advanced language solutions. Combining our use of modern technology, comprehensive employee benefits with our open and welcoming work culture is what sets us apart.

Maybe it's because of the products that have helped countless people worldwide, or maybe it's because of our shared goal of improving communication for individuals and businesses worldwide. **Meet the team behind this journey**
We are looking for a technical lead for our DevEx function. Working with a team of around 20 people, you will be responsible for building a strong Developer Experience function within the company.

The teams are the amalgamation of the former core DevEx team, the Web Platform team and the Backend Tooling team, which were recently merged to focus on the overall mission of delivering a world-class developer experience.
You will be working as part of the Olympus Unit which provides production and platform engineering services to the whole engineering organisation.
**Your Responsibilities**
It all starts with our vision of a strong Developer Experience and enabling teams to work at their best.

You collaborate with the engineering teams across the organisation to understand their needs and come to data-driven decisions on how to improve our engineering department. We want to allow every engineer to perform to the best of their ability. Giving them the right tools and spreading knowledge internally is your mission.

**People Leadership** To lead the DevEx organisation, you’re directly responsible for a small number of Engineering Managers and their teams, guiding the EMs in their growth and providing strategic direction.

**Managing Growth** Within the overall operations department, we aim to scale better than the overall growth of the business. You will contribute to this goal by enabling our engineers to deliver more. With our constantly evolving product landscape, you'll never run out of challenges!

**Strategic Leadership:** Responsibilities include leading the strategic direction of the team's engagements and collaborating with stakeholders. BOSS ENERGY CONSULTING LTD – PIPING & LAYOUT LEAD

BOSS Energy has been retained by a leading green hydrogen project developer seeking to hire a Piping & Layout Lead to join their European office. They are seeking a well-rounded individual comfortable with taking decisions quickly and effectively without a huge support team. Working on projects from feasibility through to operations this is an exciting opportunity to join a well-financed organisation at the forefront of the H2 revolution.
**Responsibilities:**
* Responsibility for modelling equipment, pipework, preliminary structures, access routes and developing and delivering plant layout drawings from initial concept through detailed design
column2: then provide oversight to EPC Contractor and maintain technical authority on behalf of the company into operations phase (to also cover modifications across asset life)

column1: * Establish procedures and controls for piping disciplines and drive design standards in layouts, ensuring a consistent application of relevant HSE standards, local regulations and best practices for projects from their initial concept to detailed design
* Adhering to and supporting development of discipline, project specifications, corporate specifications and standards relating to piping and plant layout.

* Develop and Assure project deliverables and activities in accordance with relevant codes and standards applicable to the project (e.g., ASME, BS, API etc.) and provide technical piping and layout expertise and recommendations to all associated parties on a project.
* Carry out site surveys and establish plant layout and pipe routing on brownfield and greenfield projects.

* Scope, review and assure piping & layout deliverables from our engineering contractors to ensure the necessary quality of work and ultimately successful and safe delivery of our projects to cost, budget and performance.
* Collaborate with vendors and package providers to ensure all physical and documentation interfaces are managed without re-work.
**Core Competencies:**
* 15+ years’ experience in onshore piping and plant layout design for petrochemical plants
* Must be able to demonstrate previous Pre-FEED, FEED and EPC experience, ideally both as a contractor and also in an owner/operator team, overseeing engineering/EPC contractors

* Expert in the principles of plant layout and piping design incl. layout of pipework, layout of areas for mechanical equipment, knowledge and understanding of operational access & maintenance requirements for different equipment.
* Knowledge of safety aspects, environmental aspects, and commercial aspects of piping and equipment layout.
* Proven in applying principles of Inherently Safer Design.
* Proficient in developing piping and plant layout designs from concept to detailed design.
* Knowledge of pipe stress and supporting requirements to develop early layouts prior to detailed stress analysis.
* Must have knowledge and demonstrate experience following piping European, American and International standards applicable to the petrochemical industry.
* Proficient in using 2D and 3D CAD software – Autocad / E3D/ Smartplant
* Experience in participation of constructability reviews and P&ID reviews.
* Experience working in Green/Blue/Grey Hydrogen, Green/Grey Methanol, Green/Grey Ammonia, Refining, Petchems
* Experience in designing large scale petrochemical projects (€1bn) in Europe
* Experienced across full lifecycle from Feasibility to Start-up
column2: and with track record of influencing design, and package providers, to facilitate early integrity testing and functional-testing of new or modified plant

https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=7b0d07b2e530db89,indeed,DevOps Platform engineer (AWS),ANWB,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Anwb,"Den Haag, ZH, NL",fulltime,2024-07-04,,,,,False,,,,"Wij zijn de Developer Experience Tribe van de ANWB en wij zoeken een ervaren DevOps Platform Engineer. Ben jij op zoek naar een functie waarin je een cruciale rol speelt in de adoptie en verbetering van ons DevOps-platform? Lees dan snel verder!
### **Jouw rol**
**Waarom deze functie?**

Als DevOps Platform Engineer draag je bij aan de continuïteit, snelheid en veiligheid van de grootste vereniging van Nederland. Je werkt samen je collega’s aam de adoptie van ons DevOps-platform en aan het continu te verbeteren op basis van feedback van gebruikers en ontwikkelingen in de markt. Ons DevOps-platform biedt diverse capabilities om het leven van onze engineers makkelijker te maken:

* **Monitoring & Observability:** Real-time monitoring, alerts, gecentraliseerd logbeheer en analytics dashboards met tools zoals Grafana en Sentry, die inzicht geven in de gezondheid en prestaties van systemen.

* **Building & Releasing:** Geautomatiseerde CI/CD-pipelines, beheer van build agents, versiebeheer van broncode, beveiligingsscans en artifact management met tools zoals GitLab, essentieel voor het bouwen, testen en uitrollen van applicaties.
* **Container & Frontend Hosting:** Veilige basisimages en geautomatiseerde deployments voor hosting van back- en frontend applicaties, met schaalbaarheid verzorgd door een Kubernetes-cluster (AWS).

* **Domains & Certificates:** Domeinregistratie, URL-redirects en certificaatbeheer voor veilige en efficiënte domeinhandling, inclusief het beheer van onze catalogus van domeinregistraties en redirects.
**Wat houdt het werk precies in?**

Samen met de Product Owner, een Scrummaster, een Applicatiebeheerder, een Quality Assurance-engineer en vier andere DevOps-engineers bouwen en beheren jullie het DevOps-platform. We werken op een ontspannen en informele manier samen en delen onze passie voor technologie. Omdat we onderlinge verbinding belangrijk vinden, treffen we elkaar iedere woensdag op kantoor in Den Haag. De andere dagen werk je naar wens op kantoor of vanuit huis.

Je bouwt en beheert ons platform, dat onder andere bestaat uit GitLab, Grafana, Sentry en AWS (inclusief EKS en Lambdas). Daarnaast verricht je operationele werkzaamheden bij onze hostingpartner voor de onderdelen die nog in het datacentrum staan. Je ondersteunt teams bij de migratie van hun applicaties naar het platform en de cloud. Je zorgt ervoor dat ons platform gebruiksvriendelijk en efficiënt is en voldoet aan de behoeften van onze engineers. Om self-service mogelijk te maken, integreer je ons platform in ons developer portal. Verder bouw je security, monitoring, audit en risk-management in ons platform en pas je beheerprocessen aan met principes uit Infrastructure as Code, DevOps, Continuous Delivery en automated deployments.
Ben jij de DevOps Platform Engineer die wij zoeken? Solliciteer dan nu en help ons onze engineers een optimale werkomgeving te bieden!
### **Ons aanbod**
* Bruto maandsalaris tussen €3.613,- en €5.982,- (o.b.v. 38 uur) en een eindejaarsuitkering van 5,58%
* Prima pensioenregeling
* Korting op verschillende ANWB-producten en -diensten
* Volop trainings-, opleidings-, en ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden bij onze ANWB Academie
* Goede voorzieningen om thuis te werken en een thuiswerkvergoeding van €2,35 per dag (onbelast) – de ANWB is voorstander van het hybride werken
* 25 verlofdagen en 13 adv-dagen per jaar op basis van 40-urige werkweek. Ook kun je sparen voor extra verlof
* Internetvergoeding van €35,- per maand
* Persoonlijk inzetbaarheidsbudget van €700,- bruto per jaar
* ANWB-lidmaatschap met Wegenwacht Nederland Standaard of de Wegenwacht Fiets Service
* Bij ons kun je kiezen uit werken op Windows of Mac.
### **Ons team**

Samen met een productowner, een scrummaster, een applicatiebeheerder, een quality assurance-engineer en vier andere DevOps-engineers vorm je het team Platforminnovatie en -beheer. We werken op een ontspannen en informele manier met elkaar samen en delen onze liefde voor het vak. We sparren graag en zijn goed op elkaar ingespeeld. Omdat we onderlinge verbinding belangrijk vinden, treffen we elkaar iedere woensdag op kantoor in Den Haag. De andere dagen werken we naar wens op kantoor of vanuit huis
### **Als achtergrond neem jij mee**
* HBO- of WO-niveau.
* Minimaal vier jaar ervaring als DevOps-engineer.
* Ervaring met Agile/Kanban.
* Kennis van AWS, GitLab/GitOps, Terraform (Infrastructure as Code), Kubernetes en Akamai.
* Je werkt graag samen met anderen aan de best mogelijke oplossing.
* Je pioniert graag en wilt jezelf blijven ontwikkelen.
* Je communiceert helder, zowel mondeling als schriftelijk.

https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=b0bde70e9c6d4cbc,indeed,Data Scientist,,,"Zaltbommel, GE, NL",,2024-07-04,,,,,False,,,,"**About ITsPeople**

ITsPeople is a leading management and consulting firm specializing in guiding organizations through complex digital transformations and enhancing their organizational agility. We empower our clients to navigate and overcome intricate business challenges by leveraging data-driven insights and managing large-scale transformation projects. Our mission is to help companies strengthen their market position by adopting advanced data analytics and AI, fostering a culture of agility, and driving sustained operational excellence.
**Role Overview**

As a Data Scientist at ITsPeople, you will be instrumental in transforming data into actionable insights that support our clients' strategic objectives. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to solve complex problems, develop predictive models, and drive data-driven decision-making. This role is ideal for a highly analytical individual with a passion for uncovering patterns and insights from large datasets and communicating these findings effectively.
**Key Responsibilities**
* **Data Collection and Preparation:** Gather, clean, and prepare large datasets from various sources for analysis, ensuring data quality and integrity.
* **Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA):** Conduct exploratory analyses to discover trends, patterns, and anomalies in data, providing valuable insights to stakeholders.
* **Predictive and Diagnostic Modeling:** Develop, implement, and evaluate machine learning models and algorithms to predict outcomes and diagnose issues.
* **Machine Learning and AI:** Apply advanced statistical and machine learning techniques to build models that address business challenges and optimize processes.
* **Data Visualization and Reporting:** Create compelling visualizations and dashboards to communicate data insights and support decision-making processes.
* **Collaboration and Teamwork:** Work closely with project teams, including data engineers, business analysts, and domain experts, to understand requirements and deliver data-driven solutions.
* **Continuous Learning and Improvement:** Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in data science and technology to continually improve methodologies and tools.
**Required Qualifications**
* **Education:** Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
* **Experience:** 0 to 3 years of experience in data science, analytics, or a related role. We welcome enthusiastic individuals looking to start or advance their career in data science.

* **Technical Skills:** Proficiency in Python, SQL, and data visualization tools such as Jupyter Notebook, Tableau, or similar platforms. Experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g., Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow) is a plus.
* **Soft Skills:** Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain complex data concepts to non-technical stakeholders and collaborate effectively within teams.
* **Language skills:** Fluency in Dutch and English is required.
**Personal Attributes**
* **Analytical Mindset:** Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to derive meaningful insights from complex data sets.
* **Detail Oriented:** Attention to detail in data analysis, modeling, and reporting, ensuring accuracy and reliability in all deliverables.
* **Proactive and Driven:** Self-motivated and proactive in seeking out new challenges and opportunities to apply data science.
* **Team Player:** Collaborative spirit with the ability to work effectively in multidisciplinary teams and contribute to a positive team dynamic.
* **Personal Leadership:** Demonstrates initiative, responsibility, and the ability to lead and inspire others without formal authority.
**Training and Development**

At ITsPeople, we believe in the growth and development of our team members. We offer a robust training program designed to equip new and emerging professionals with the skills and knowledge needed to excel in their roles. Our comprehensive training covers the latest in data science techniques, tools, and industry best practices, providing you with the foundation to succeed and grow within our dynamic team.
**Why Join ITsPeople?**

Joining ITsPeople means being part of a vibrant and supportive team dedicated to driving transformative change for our clients through data-driven solutions. We value innovation, collaboration, and a customer-centric approach. As a Data Scientist, you will have the opportunity to work on high-impact projects, engage with a diverse range of clients, and contribute significantly to their success.

We offer a stimulating work environment that promotes professional development and personal growth. You will have the autonomy to manage your projects, collaborate with senior consultants, and play a key role in our data-driven strategies.",analytics engineer,https://www.joinitspeople.nl/jobs/4705973-data-scientist,,,,,,,,,,,b0bde70e9c6d4cbc,,en,,,

https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=6e2029b78f8368d0,indeed,MLOps engineer,ANWB,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Anwb,"Den Haag, ZH, NL",fulltime,2024-05-17,,,,,False,,,,"Binnen het centrale data science team van de ANWB word jij dé engineer die voor ons het MLOps platform kan helpen uitbouwen en onderhouden. Je krijgt de kans om zelf je stempel te drukken op zowel het MLOps platform van de hele ANWB als AWS cloud engineering en software development best practices van het data science team.
### **Jouw rol**
Doorontwikkeling van het MLOps platform, zoals bijvoorbeeld:
* Inrichten monitoring
* Nieuwe AWS features toepassen
* LLM Services toevoegen
* Onderhouden van het MLOps platform
* Usability op basis van gebruikersfeedback
* Codebase & bugs
* Resource & cost monitoring
* Beheren van de AWS accounts, incl. privacy & security
* Opzetten van data pipelines voor specifieke use cases
* Meedenken met de data scientisten om een PoC om te zetten naar een productiewaardige oplossing gebruikmakend van het MLOps platform
### **Ons aanbod**
* Bruto maandsalaris tussen €3.613,- en €5.982,- (o.b.v. 38 uur) en een eindejaarsuitkering van 5,58%
* Prima pensioenregeling
* Korting op verschillende ANWB-producten en -diensten
* Volop trainings-, opleidings-, en ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden bij onze ANWB Academie
* Goede voorzieningen om thuis te werken en een thuiswerkvergoeding van €2,35 per dag (onbelast) – de ANWB is voorstander van het hybride werken
* 25 verlofdagen en 13 adv-dagen per jaar op basis van 40-urige werkweek. Ook kun je sparen voor extra verlof
* Internetvergoeding van €35,- per maand
* Persoonlijk inzetbaarheidsbudget van €700,- bruto per jaar
* ANWB-lidmaatschap met Wegenwacht Nederland Standaard of de Wegenwacht Fiets Service
### **Ons team**

Waar denk jij aan als je aan ANWB denkt? Grote kans dat je aan wegenwacht en hulpverlening denkt. Dat klopt! Toch doen we veel meer. Wij zijn een vereniging die ook producten verkoopt in onze winkels, mooie maatschappelijk relevante projecten realiseert, verzekeringen biedt en reizen voor onze leden organiseert. Dat maakt ANWB een veelzijdige werkgever met verschillende typologieën onder één dak en waarbij maatschappelijke impact vooropstaat. Al deze producten en diensten genereren veel data die we binnen het ACE team, het Analytics Center of Excellence, gebruiken om de werkzaamheden binnen de ANWB te optimaliseren en te innoveren. Jij wordt onderdeel van dit team.
Het ACE team is een gecentraliseerd team
column2: dit betekent dat we opdrachten binnen de gehele ANWB uitvoeren. Jouw focus ligt op de doorontwikkeling en het onderhoud van het MLOps platform. Naast de samenwerking met de data scientisten zal je veel contact hebben met het ITOps team – zij zorgen voor een centrale ondersteuning en implementatie van AWS – en de DataHub – een club engineers die bouwt aan het centrale data loket binnen de ANWB.

https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=db7c1bfbf3bef8ae,indeed,Data Engineering Associate,,,"Amsterdam, NH, NL",fulltime,2024-05-08,,,,,False,,,,"We are looking for a Data professional to join our Data Engineering team. **Who we are**

Metyis is a global and forward-thinking firm operating across a wide range of industries, developing and delivering Big Data, Digital Commerce, Marketing & Design solutions and Advisory services. At Metyis, our long-term partnership model brings long-lasting impact and growth to our business partners and clients through extensive execution capabilities.

With our team, you can experience a collaborative environment with highly skilled multidisciplinary experts, where everyone has room to build bigger and bolder ideas. Being part of Metyis means you can speak your mind and be creative with your knowledge. Imagine the things you can achieve with a team that encourages you to be the best version of yourself.
We are Metyis. Partners for Impact.
**What we offer:**
* Interact with senior stakeholders at our clients on regular basis to drive their business towards impactful change.
* Working with Data Scientists to take data throughout its lifecycle - acquisition, exploration, data cleaning, integration, analysis, interpretation, and visualization.
* Become part of a fast-growing international and diverse team.
**What you will do:**
* Engineer complete technical solutions to solve concrete business challenges in the areas of digital marketing, e-commerce, Business Intelligence, and self-service analytics.
* Collect functional and non-functional requirements, consider technical environments, business constraints, and enterprise organizations.

* Support our clients in executing their Big Data strategies by designing and building operational data platforms: ETL pipelines, data anonymization pipelines, data lakes, near real-time streaming data hubs, web services, training and scoring machine learning models.

* Share data engineering knowledge by giving technical training.
* Guide and mentor team members.

* 3-5 years of experience in data analytics.
* Understanding of data warehousing principles, concepts and best practices (e.g. ODS, data marts, data lakes, data vault, 3NF).
* Advanced SQL, data transformation and data profiling skills.
* Experience of building production ETL/ELT pipelines at scale.
* 1-2 years of hands on experience with Azure, GCP or AWS, Data factory, Databricks, Synapse (DWH), Azure Functions, App logic and other data analytics services, including streaming.
* Experience with Airflow and Kubernetes.
* Programming languages: Python (PySpark), scripting languages like Bash.
* Knowledge of Git, CI/CD operations and Docker.
* Basic knowledge of PowerBI is a plus.
* True engineering craftsmanship mindset.
* Passionate about continuous improvement and working collaboratively.
* Strong problem-solving skills, coupled with the ability to convey designs and ideas to a wider audience.
* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Economics, Engineering, Operations Research, Statistics, Business or other related technical disciplines (Master's Degree is a plus).

In a changing world, diversity and inclusion are core values for team well-being and performance. #management #agile #cloud #IT #scrum

Our mission is to build cultures of innovation at companies by transforming the way they work, by modernising their IT infrastructure & apps, and by elevating their customer experiences. As a Premier Google Cloud partner, we do this by implementing innovative Google Cloud solutions and by leveraging cutting-edge AI & Machine Learning technologies.

Devoteam G Cloud’s certified Cloud engineers build disruptive solutions on Google Cloud Platform to give organisations a competitive advantage. We migrate and modernise legacy applications & IT infrastructure using Cloud Native solutions such as Kubernetes, Anthos and Serverless solutions.

We help our customers with their hybrid- and multi-Cloud strategies and to get to actionable business insights faster, by accelerating their data & analytics. Next to that, we give the workplace of the future shape with solutions like Google Workspace.

As a Google Cloud Project manager, you’ll play a key role in delivery Cloud projects to our customers. Together with cloud and data engineers, service leads and sales, you’ll run your projects making sure to meet the project deadlines and our customer’s expectations. You adapt and anticipate the wishes of your customers and follow through. You enjoy working with people and you are able to build strong customer relationships.

* [Must-have] Excellent verbal and written communication in both Dutch and English.

**What we have to offer:**
* An exciting job where innovation in technology is not a buzzword but a reality.
* Continuous training & development of soft- and hard skills, including training at several Google locations.
* A competitive salary, in line with your profile.
* Additional benefits.
* An awesome team of colleagues & regular team building activities.
* The ability to work with the world’s leading companies in technology and innovation.

Dit doe je op basis van je inhoudelijke kennis, bijvoorbeeld op het gebied van AWS of Azure.

Belangrijk is dat je naast technische kennis ook gevoel hebt voor de business crux van het project en de uitdagingen die bij een dataplatform horen, zoals datamanagement, privacy en stakeholder management.
Dit kenmerkt onze integrale aanpak en maakt Hot ITem Conclusion anders dan anderen. Jouw werk wordt écht gebruikt binnen de bedrijven om het verschil te maken.
* Naast het ontwerpen van een solide datafundament, zorg je samen met je team van Data Engineers ook voor de realisatie. Hierdoor zijn onze klanten nóg succesvoller met data en daar doen we het voor.
* Bij het realiseren van de oplossing is er aandacht voor het gebruiken en creëren van herbruikbare onderdelen.
* Jij zet de technische lijnen uit
column2: zowel voor de infrastructuur maar vooral ook voor datamodellen en datastromen. Hoe verwerken wij data en hoe zorgen we ervoor dat dit optimaal aansluit bij de besturingsbehoefte van onze klanten?

column1: * De klant heeft een goed beeld van de technische oplossing die wordt opgeleverd, het noodzakelijke beheer en de te verwachten ‘product life cycle’.
* Dankzij jou is er grip op de techniek binnen het project en is het geleverde werk van kwalitatief hoog niveau. Echt iets om trots op te zijn!
**Voorbeelden van recente projecten:**

* Het realiseren van een modern datafundament bij een openbaar vervoer bedrijf op basis van cloud technologie, met daarin een plek voor zowel gestructureerde als ongestructureerde data. Hierdoor is deze klant in staat om nog meer waarde uit data te halen en datagedreven te worden.
* Voor de grootste pech hulpverlener van Nederland realiseren we een datahub, waarin data voor de gehele organisatie beschikbaar wordt gesteld.
* Realisatie van een Datawarehouse voor een telecom bedrijf, waardoor zij een continu beeld hebben van aantallen klanten, aansluitingen en product afname.
### **Kennisdeling en ontwikkeling**
* Je zorgt voor een goede samenwerking en kennisuitwisseling tussen de verschillende (technisch) specialisten, zodat het team zich geïnspireerd en uitgedaagd voelt
* Het technisch team is uitgerust met de juiste kennis en weet hoe de technische oplossing eruit ziet en wat er van hen verwacht wordt
* Er zijn volop trainings- en leermogelijkheden in onze competentie groep 'Architectuur & Tech Lead'
* Je bent omringd door collega's die hun kennis graag met je delen
* Je krijgt veel vrijheid om een eigen ontwikkelpad uit te stippelen
### **Wie zijn wij**

Het cluster Data Engineering bestaat uit ongeveer 60 Engineers, Tech Leads en Architecten. Samen met onze collega's uit de andere clusters willen we het verschil maken bij de klant. Bij ons is er veel ruimte voor plezier en persoonlijke ontwikkeling. Denk aan lasergamen op kantoor en varen met onze grachtensloep, maar ook Tech events waarin je bijgepraat wordt over de laatste innovaties in ons vakgebied.Hot ITem Conclusion gelooft in wendbare, datagedreven organisaties die de concurrentie voorblijven door zich snel te kunnen aanpassen aan nieuwe ontwikkelingen. Alles wat wij doen heeft tot doel om de performance van mensen, afdelingen en organisaties onderscheidend te verbeteren. Dit doen wij samen met onze klanten, op basis van kwalitatief goede data en inzicht in de cruciale zaken.

* Gezonde dosis relativeringsvermogen en humor

https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=eba653d151570e8e,indeed,Senior NLP/LLM Data Scientist,ING,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Ing,"Amsterdam, NH, NL",,2024-07-25,,,,,False,,,,"ING Analytics is responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond. The team consists of a number of Global Analytics Centre of Excellences around the bank’s key capabilities (such as Pricing, Risk Management, Financial Crime, Customer Intelligence and People Analytics.) as well as strong coordination areas around data management, technology, customer journey, UX and external partnerships.
**Roles and responsibilities**

You will be part of the COO Analytics Tribe. In our tribe, we apply advanced analytics & Gen AI solutions for the Financial Crime domain globally as well as customer centre analytics. Traditional ML models and Gen AI solutions are used to detect, mitigate and to effectively tackle the risk of financial crime for our customers and our society, making us a safer and more compliant bank. Our tribe consists of more than two dozen data scientists, engineers, data analysts, and customer journey experts, working together to deliver innovative solutions in our domain across multiple countries.

Specifically, you will help creating innovative and scalable solutions in the area of Contact Center Analytics (CCA). You will work collaboratively with a broad group of stakeholders, including global and local CCA units to define and develop the solutions and consequently you will work with technical teams to implement these solutions across the organization.

We work in a fun and creative environment, and we’re dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from traditional machine learning algorithms to detect suspicious behaviors to enhance our processes by applying innovative techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building solutions across all countries ING operates in.
**Your focus areas will be:**
* Design and implementation of solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies
* Working with our engineering team to productionize your solution
* Using the cutting-edge frameworks and technologies such as generative AI and Large Language Models
* Following best practices in developing ML code and ML software tests
* Keeping pace with the evolution and best practices in the GenAI and NL domain
* Assisting your model users to understand the data science principles and when needed explaining the model behavior and possible corrective actions.
* Contributing to strengthening the analytical capability within the team.
* Actively learn about our domain, reach out to our stakeholders, and tell captivating stories with our data to create a journey that makes our bank and our society safer
**How to succeed**
* Always thinking a step ahead and never satisfied with the status quo
* Enthusiasm for helping others to be successful and a talent for taking it on and making it happen
* You have a learning attitude. Not only to master new technologies and programming languages, but also on the interpersonal level. You are proven to be able to ask and give feedback
* You embrace challenges in a fast-changing and complex environment
* You are a naturally collaborative person who listens and invests in others to achieve common goals
* You have a Pro-active and can-do attitude (self-steering)
* You take pride in your code and take responsibility for keeping it running in production
* You combine both thinking of the future and a hands-on, right now attitude
* You enjoy working in a team, with highly skilled people, having a creative atmosphere where trying out new things is encouraged.
* MSc or PhD in Computer Science or similar domain, and preferably in Natural Language Processing, Information Retrieval, or Machine Learning.
* A minimum of 3 years experience in building Natural Language Processing or Information Retrieval pipelines and models
* Experience with operationalisation of LLMs or Generative AI applications
* You have an in-depth understanding of algorithms like Conditional Random Fields, Transformers, Recurrent Neural Networks, and Convolutional Neural Network
* Strong programming skills in Python, experience in delivering production grade code, and reasonable SQL understanding
* Can build an “end-to-end ML software product” which has NLP/IR component
* Experience with Deep Learning frameworks like Tensorflow and PyTorch
* You have excellent oral and written communication skills at the technical and business level
* Fluent in written and spoken English.
* Familiarity with Agile Scrum way of working
**Nice To Have**
* Experience with Google Cloud Platform
* Experience with applying NLP in banking domain
* Knowledge of DevOps practices including Git and CI/CD
* Experience with CI/CD for Machine Learning pipeline (CD4ML).
* Experience with traditional ML algorithms is a plus
**Rewards & Benefits**

We want to make sure that it's possible for you to strike the right balance between your career and your private life. You can find out more about our employment conditions at https://www.ing.jobs/netherlands/Why-ING/benefits.htm
**The benefits of working with us at ING include:**
* A salary tailored to your qualities and experience.
* 24-27 vacation days depending on the contract.
* Pension scheme.
* 13th-month salary.
* Individual Savings Contribution (BIS), 3.5% of your gross annual salary.
* 8% Holiday payment.
* Hybrid working to blend home working for focus and office working for collaboration and co-creation.
* Personal growth and challenging work with endless possibilities.
* An informal working environment with innovative colleagues.
**About Us**

With 60,000 employees and operations in approximately 40 countries, there is no shortage of opportunities for people with initiative who want to help people take a step ahead in life and in business. Do you want to work at the cutting edge of what's possible and at the same time ensure you work with integrity and hold the customer's interests at heart? Do you want to be surrounded by progressive, inspiring, diverse, and supportive colleagues? Then there is no better place to invest your talents than at ING. Join us. https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=30e91913520acefb,indeed,Clinical Study Researcher,Danone,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Danone,"Utrecht, UT, NL",fulltime,2024-07-24,,,,,False,,,valerija.usova@danone.com,"About the job
**Clinical Study Researcher**
*(Utrecht, full-time, hybrid)*

Do you want to make a health difference through nutrition with your scientific and methodological expertise in clinical research? We are looking for a Clinical Study Researcher in our team ‘NCRU & Explorative Clinical Studies’. You will be part of a multidisciplinary team, work closely with the senior Explo Clinical Study Managers in the team and will report to the Sr Team leader NCRU & Explorative Clinical Studies. The team’s clinical evidence focus is the set-up, initiation and conduct of explorative clinical studies of our specialized nutrition portfolio.
About the Job:

As a Clinical Study Researcher (CSR) you will provide scientific and methodological clinical expertise in our research and innovation projects. With your experience in clinical study methodology and scientific skills, you will be responsible for study design, writing of the protocol and analysis plan, interpretation and reporting of the study (results) in accordance with the clinical study plan, applicable legislation and Standard Operating Procedures.
You will:
* Translate business needs, existing clinical and literature data into a clinical study protocol.
* Be member of a multi-disciplinary clinical study team.
* Provide methodological/scientific support during all phases of the clinical study.
* Assess feasibility of the study protocol and be involved in the investigator selection process.
* Interpret results and write the clinical study report.
* Safeguard the quality of your studies.
* Liaise with scientists and health professionals
* Build internal and external networks of Key Opinion Leaders/investigators/experts and other stakeholders.
* Supervise third parties if activities are outsourced.
About you

You have a university degree and/or PhD (preferred) in life science or related scientific discipline and have profound experience in (international) clinical research in an academic setting or the (bio-) pharmaceutical industry. You have thorough scientific knowledge in study methodology and expertise concerning clinical research and literature data.
In addition, you bring:
* Knowledge of ICH-GCP guidelines, legislation, SOPs and clinical study methodology.
* Scientific expertise in nutrition-related clinical research is an advantage.
* Excellent command of spoken and written English for writing protocols, study documents, papers, reports and delivering presentations.
* Pragmatic attitude and be adaptable to the changing needs of the business.Like to work very precise and to solve complex challenges.
* Ability to think logically and analytically.
* Good time management and organizational skills.
* Ability to interact and communicate effectively.
About us

At Danone, we offer a complete package of benefits, with a competitive primary salary and yearly bonus, but also benefits like a premium free pension, 30 days annual leave and several discounts on a collective health insurance and even on some of our products. In the Netherlands we also offer a hybrid working environment which enables each team to meet our people's desire for flexibility. Across our 3 office hubs in Hoofddorp, Rijswijk and Utrecht this helps us create better opportunities for connection & synergies across our entities, teams, functions and categories.
**What’s next?**

Hit the “apply now” button. After your application deadline first feedback will follow within 2 weeks. In case you are invited to the selection process you should expect to receive feedback 2 weeks after each step of the process
To comply with GDPR regulations, we cannot process your personal data without given consent. Therefore, we strongly recommend applying directly via our website.
Need more information? Please contact Valerija Usova, Talent Manager via valerija.usova@danone.com.

https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=98a6b4b7e84ac327,indeed,2 PhD's on nature-based approaches for climate adaptation in Dutch lowland,Universiteit Utrecht,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Universiteit-Utrecht,"Utrecht, UT, NL",,2024-07-24,,,,,False,,,"m.w.straatsma@uu.nl, e.stouthamer@uu.nl","Climate change, biodiversity loss, and the competition for space due to economic development pose increasing threats to the Netherlands. To maintain a safe, economically viable, and biodiverse environment, fundamental changes are needed in our land use, soil management, and water management. In this context, transitioning towards Nature-Based adaptation becomes increasingly important.
**Your job**

As part of the Nationaal Groeifonds programme NL2120, the Department of Physical Geography at Utrecht University explores adaptation approaches for Dutch rivers and peatlands. We are seeking two PhD candidates who are eager to contribute to this climate adaptation challenge through two separate projects.

**Sustainable RiverScapes (Position 1)** aims to develop integrated nature-based strategies for the Dutch river areas to adapt to the changing climate and enhance biodiversity. The challenge is to find adaptation solutions that optimize flood safety, sedimentation, biodiversity, and balance cost and benefits. You will extend and apply the RiverScape model, which simulates the hydro-morphological effects of nature-based interventions in the river-floodplain area. Using field observations with state-of-the-art instruments enabled by the new Delta-ENIGMA facility, you will quantitatively analyze floodplain vegetation and sediment dynamics to develop new vegetation and sediment modules in RiverScape. Subsequently, you will evaluate different strategies under a range of future scenarios to assess how nature-based approaches can contribute to the climate adaptation of river landscapes.

**Sustainable Peatlands (Position 2)** aims to develop strategies for the sustainable development and climate-resilient use of peatland areas to enhance carbon sequestration and biodiversity, and to reduce the emission of greenhouse gases. To date, it is unknown how drained peatlands can be optimally used as nature-based solutions from a greenhouse gas perspective, and what water and soil management measures are required. Fundamental understanding of the natural dynamics of peatland systems is still needed. For this research, a unique peatland growth pilot is being developed in the province of Friesland. Field measurements at the pilot site and in other peatlands, laboratory measurements, and numerical models will be used to investigate peat growth, carbon storage, and greenhouse gas emissions under changing conditions such as groundwater levels. In this project, you will quantify and monitor carbon sequestration under different conditions in peatland areas across the Netherlands, identify the role of the water system and other controls on carbon sequestration, and develop strategies to make polders climate-neutral.

Within the NL2120 project, both PhDs will integrate their results with studies on governance and economics conducted at other universities and by external parties (Deltares, WUR, NGOs, water boards, and Rijkswaterstaat).

To support academic and personal development, PhD candidates will follow courses and assist in teaching Earth Sciences at the Bachelor’s and Master’s levels. Together, these activities amount to twenty percent of the contracted time.
**Your qualities**
This project may be right for you if you have:
* an MSc in Earth sciences, physical geography, hydrology, environmental science, civil engineering (position 1), or ecology (position 2)
* experience with geoscientific field observations and data retrieval using field equipment
* proven skills in programming, numerical modelling, and using spatial datasets (Python / willing to learn Python), as well as scenario analysis
* an interest in interdisciplinary scientific challenges and interactions
* ability to work independently, take initiative, and demonstrate a critical mindset
* strong organizational and communication skills, with a collaborative team spirit
* excellent English oral and written skills, and a willingness to learn Dutch.
**Our offer**
We offer:
* a position for 1 year, with an extension to a total of four years upon a successful assessment in the first year, and with the specific intent that it results in a doctorate within this period

* a working week of 36 hours and a gross monthly salary between €2.770 and €3.539 in the case of full-time employment (salary scale P under the Collective Labour Agreement for Dutch Universities (CAO NU))
* 8% holiday pay and 8.3% year-end bonus
* a pension scheme, partially paid parental leave and flexible terms of employment based on the CAO NU.

In addition to the terms of employment laid down in the CAO NU, Utrecht University has a number of schemes and facilities of its own for employees. This includes schemes facilitating professional development, leave schemes and schemes for sports and cultural activities, as well as discounts on software and other IT products. We also offer access to additional employee benefits through our Terms of Employment Options Model. In this way, we encourage our employees to continue to invest in their growth. For more information, please visit Working at Utrecht University.
**About us**

A better future for everyone. This ambition motivates our scientists in executing their leading research and inspiring teaching. At Utrecht University, the various disciplines collaborate intensively towards major strategic themes. Our focus is on Dynamics of Youth, Institutions for Open Societies, Life Sciences and Pathways to Sustainability. Sharing science, shaping tomorrow.

Utrecht University’s Faculty of Geosciences studies the Earth: from the Earth’s core to its surface, including man’s spatial and material utilisation of the Earth – always with a focus on sustainability and innovation. With 3,400 students (BSc and MSc) and 720 staff, the faculty is a strong and challenging organisation. The Faculty of Geosciences is organised in four Departments: Earth Sciences, Human Geography & Spatial Planning, Physical Geography, and Sustainable Development.

The team of the Department of Physical Geography excels in research and education on BSc, MSc and PhD level. We research processes, patterns and dynamics of Earth’s systems from the mountains to the sea, and the interaction in between. This knowledge is essential for the sustainable management of our planet and to guarantee the availability of resources for the next generations. We are a lively department that hosts an active early career community (PhD-students, researchers and lecturers). We organise a warm welcome for every new member.
**More information**

For more information, please contact Dr Menno Straatsma (Assistant Professor Ecomorphology and river management) at m.w.straatsma@uu.nl for position 1, or Prof. Dr Esther Stouthamer (Professor Delta Evolution and Subsurface Processes) at e.stouthamer@uu.nl for position 2.
Candidates for this vacancy will be recruited by Utrecht University.
**Apply now**

As Utrecht University, we want to be a home for everyone. We value staff with diverse backgrounds, perspectives and identities, including cultural, religious or ethnic background, gender, sexual orientation, disability or age. We strive to create a safe and inclusive environment in which everyone can flourish and contribute.

To apply, please send your curriculum vitae and a letter of motivation via the ‘apply now’ button. Additionally, if you hold an international (non-Dutch) Master’s degree, please also submit your BA and MA diplomas along with your grade lists in English.
The interviews for position 1 (Riverscape) are on 16 and 17 September
column2: for position 2 (Peat) on 23 and 25 September. The first round can be online via MS Teams. column1: https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=410dd25dab010ce1,indeed,Principal IT Business Analyst Data & Analytics,Medtronic,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Medtronic,"Heerlen, LI, NL",fulltime,2024-07-24,,,,,False,,,,"At Medtronic you can begin a life-long career of exploration and innovation, while helping champion healthcare access and equity for all. You’ll lead with purpose, breaking down barriers to innovation in a more connected, compassionate world.
A Day in the Life

Bring your talents to an industry leader in medical technology and healthcare solutions: Medtronic technologies transform the lives of two people every second, every hour, every day. And counting. Our engineers and scientists work in relentless pursuit of solutions that improve lives, harnessing the power of artificial intelligence, data insights and robotic-assisted surgery. We may not know what the future holds, but we are boldly attacking the most challenging health problems facing humanity, searching out and finding solutions.

Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned.* You enjoy being part of a global team that is designing and building data pipelines that combine and transform raw data into valuable action based data products. You are proud, enthusiastic on the work you do and are always looking for opportunities to improve the data products our team makes. The Global Region Data & Analytics department is responsible for delivering all data products within the EMEA & APAC & AMER regions.
* As an IT Business Analyst, you will liaise with our business partners and advise them on the data & analytics solutions and opportunities that will support their strategic ambitions.
* You will facilitate workshops with our internal customers to gather their information needs, then connect with the technical teams to come up with the best set-up on how to implement the solution.
* You will play a key role in assessing and designing solutions from a functional perspective, while keeping our business partners informed.
Required Knowledge and Experience:* Minimum 5 years of relevant experience in job offered or a similar role in analytics & data management,
* Excellent communication skills and stakeholder management abilities, including the ability to present technical concepts to non-technical audiences.
* BS/MS with quantitative focus (e.g. Information Management, economics)
* Extensive experience in gathering, documenting, and challenging business requirements
* Able to explain technical concepts in clear words to non-technical stakeholders
* Good presentation and (data) visualization skills
* (Strong) knowledge of the fundamentals of Business Intelligence and/or data warehousing (is a plus)
* Experience with Tableau and/or PowerBI (is a plus)
* Can manage big data related projects from requirements engineering and stakeholder perspective
* Strong business acumen and stakeholder management skills, strategic thinking
* Agile mindset and familiar with Agile way of working
* Outstanding team player with strong communications skills
Physical Job Requirements

The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by employees assigned to this position, but they are not an exhaustive list of all the required responsibilities and skills of this position.
Benefits & Compensation
Medtronic offers a competitive Salary and flexible Benefits Package

A commitment to our employees lives at the core of our values. We recognize their contributions. They share in the success they help to create. We offer a wide range of benefits, resources, and competitive compensation plans designed to support you at every career and life stage.
This position is eligible for a short-term incentive called the Medtronic Incentive Plan (MIP).
About Medtronic
We lead global healthcare technology and boldly attack the most challenging health problems facing humanity by searching out and finding solutions.
Our Mission — to alleviate pain, restore health, and extend life — unites a global team of 90,000+ passionate people.

We are engineers at heart— putting ambitious ideas to work to generate real solutions for real people. From the R&D lab, to the factory floor, to the conference room, every one of us experiments, creates, builds, improves and solves. We have the talent, diverse perspectives, and guts to engineer the extraordinary.

https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=a58c1a6223b33fe6,indeed,Database engineer,Professionele Diensten,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Professionele-Diensten,"Den Haag, ZH, NL","parttime, fulltime",2024-07-24,,,,,False,,,,"Parnassia Groep zoekt voor de Professionele Diensten in Den Haag een database engineer.
*Ben jij die database**engineer met passie voor SQL en SSIS die ons team komt versterken? Lees dan verder.*
**Dit ga je doen**

Parnassia Groep is marktleider in de geestelijke gezondheidszorg, die zich inzet voor het bieden van hoogwaardige zorg aan mensen met psychische problemen. Onze afdeling BIDS (bedrijfsinformatie & Data Science) speelt een cruciale rol in het ondersteunen van data gedreven besluitvorming binnen de organisatie. Ter versterking van ons team ETL (7 FTE) zijn wij op zoek naar een enthousiaste en ervaren DatabaseEngineer.

Als database engineer ben je, samen met je team, verantwoordelijk voor het ontwerpen, ontwikkelen, implementeren en onderhouden van ETL processen en de data-infrastructuur van Parnassia Groep. Je zorgt ervoor dat de data beschikbaar, toegankelijk en bruikbaar is voor analytische en rapportage doeleinden. Je werkt nauw samen met het Power BI team, data scientists, data analisten en andere stakeholders om ervoor te zorgen dat de data-infrastructuur voldoet aan de behoeften van de organisatie.
Jouw werkzaamheden:
* ontwerpen, bouwen en onderhouden van data pipelines en ETL-processen t.b.v. het PG datawarehouse in de Microsoft stack (SSIS, SQL)
* samenwerken met BIDS collega’s (analisten, data scientists en Power BI ontwikkelaars) om data te ontsluiten, te modelleren en beschikbaar te maken voor bruikbare databronnen en rapportage-inzichten
* identificeren en implementeren van best practices op het gebied van datakwaliteit en -integriteit
* evalueren en implementeren van nieuwe technologieën en tools om de data-infrastructuur te verbeteren.
**Dit ben jij**
* bachelor of masterdiploma in informatica, computerwetenschappen of een gerelateerd vakgebied
* minimaal 3 jaar aantoonbare ervaring als Data(base) Engineer in een complexe organisatie met expertise in het ontwerpen en implementeren van ETL processen en data pipelines
* ervaring met de Microsoft stack
* een stevige, communicatief sterke persoonlijkheid die zich goed kan handhaven in een dynamische omgeving en een teamplayer
* affiniteit met zorgbedrijven/zorgsector (pré).
*Om in aanmerking te komen voor deze functie is een positieve Verklaring Omtrent Gedrag (VOG) vereist.*
*Het natrekken van referenties en het controleren van diploma’s maken onderdeel uit van de sollicitatieprocedure.*
**Wij bieden**

Wij bieden onze collega’s gevarieerd en zinvol werk in een professionele en prettige werkomgeving. Daarbij hoort natuurlijk een goed pakket aan arbeidsvoorwaarden conform cao ggz. Klik **hier** voor meer informatie over onze arbeidsvoorwaarden.

Het betreft een functie voor 28-36 uur per week. Je krijgt een contract voor onbepaalde tijd. Het salaris is afhankelijk van opleiding en ervaring en bedraagt minimaal € 3076,- en maximaal € 4785,- (FWG 54/55) en minimaal € 3541,- en maximaal € 5335,- (FWG 59/60) bruto per maand op basis van een werkweek van 36 uur.
**Werken bij Parnassia Groep**

**De Professionele Diensten** is één van de ondersteunende bedrijfsonderdelen van Parnassia Groep. Het levert een breed scala aan ondersteunende diensten op het gebied van IT, HR, kwaliteit, financiën, administratie en (bedrijfs)informatie.
**Interesse?**

Heb je nog vragen of wil je meer informatie over deze vacature? Neem dan contact op met Roel van Est, manager BIDS, via 06-10368001.",data scientist,https://werkenbijparnassiagroep.nl/ad/database-engineer/0hnzyn/nl,,,,,,,,,,,a58c1a6223b33fe6,,nl,,,

* identificeren en implementeren van best practices op het gebied van datakwaliteit en -integriteit
* evalueren en implementeren van nieuwe technologieën en tools om de data-infrastructuur te verbeteren.
Dit ben jij* bachelor of masterdiploma in informatica, computerwetenschappen of een gerelateerd vakgebied
* minimaal 3 jaar aantoonbare ervaring als Data(base) Engineer in een complexe organisatie met expertise in het ontwerpen en implementeren van ETL processen en data pipelines
* ervaring met de Microsoft stack
* een stevige, communicatief sterke persoonlijkheid die zich goed kan handhaven in een dynamische omgeving en een teamplayer
* affiniteit met zorgbedrijven/zorgsector (pré).

*Ben jij die data analist die ons team komt versterken? Lees dan verder.*
Dit ga je doen

Onze afdeling BIDS (bedrijfsinformatie & Data Science) speelt een cruciale rol in het ondersteunen van data gedreven besluitvorming binnen de organisatie. BIDS bestaat uit verschillende subteams, en ter versterking van ons subteam DIA (Data Inzicht & Advies, 8 FTE) zijn wij op zoek naar een enthousiaste en ervaren data analist.

Als data analist ben je, samen met je team, verantwoordelijk voor het analyseren en beantwoorden van complexe dataverzoeken uit de organisatie. Je bent expert in het datalandschap van Parnassia Groep en draagt bij aan de doorontwikkeling van de data omgeving, data kwaliteit en data processen. Je werkt in deze hoedanigheid nauw samen met het datawarehouse-team, het Power BI team, data scientists en andere stakeholders.
Jouw werkzaamheden:
* beantwoorden van ad-hoc datavragen uit de organisatie, vraagverheldering speelt hierin een belangrijke rol
* inrichten en beheren van processen rondom periodieke data-aanlevering
* samenwerken met BIDS collega’s (analisten, data scientists en Power BI ontwikkelaars) om te komen tot verbeterde data-ontsluiting
* identificeren en implementeren van best practices op het gebied van datakwaliteit en -integriteit
* meedenken over nieuwe mogelijkheden om datagedreven werken binnen PG steeds meer vorm te geven.
Dit ben jij* bachelor of masterdiploma met een sterke kwantitatieve component, zoals (toegepaste) wiskunde, econometrie, operations research, methodologie of een gerelateerd vakgebied
* minimaal enkele jaren aantoonbare ervaring als data-analist in een complexe organisatie
* ervaring met de Microsoft stack (in het bijzonder met SQL)

* je weet problemen helder te formuleren en concrete vragen te stellen om de situatie scherp te krijgen. Verder ben je een communicatief sterke teamplayer die zich goed kan handhaven in een dynamische omgeving
* ervaring met R en/of Python is een pré
* affiniteit met de zorgsector is een pré.
*Om in aanmerking te komen voor deze functie is een positieve Verklaring Omtrent Gedrag (VOG) vereist.*

https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=6e86ad2224cf7dcf,indeed,Senior Scientist (1FTE),KLK Kolb Nederland,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Klk-Kolb-Nederland,"Delden, OV, NL",fulltime,2024-07-24,,,,,False,,,jill.melman@kolb.ch,"#### **De functie**
To support our continued successful growth, we are looking for a motivated, proactive and independently thinking Senior Scientist. **Job Description**

As a Senior Scientist you are responsible for coordinating large-scale, multidisciplinary research and innovation activities for the introduction of new and optimization of existing KLK Oleo products, processes and methods with a strong focus on meeting our customers’ (future) needs and expectations.

As a Senior Scientist at KLK Kolb Specialties you use your chemical and analytical expertise to optimize existing and create new products, processes and methods. The function requires a strong focus on delivering high-quality products which meet our customers’ needs and expectations. It also requires the ability to multitask and switch gears as you will be working on both new product developments with a short time to market and challenging research projects requiring an analytical mindset and out-of-the-box thinking.
**Location and position**

You will be part of the R&D team of KLK Oleo Europe, located in Delden, consisting of 25 FTE. As a Senior Scientist within the R&D Specialties team you will be responsible for the introduction and further development of innovative processes and products and provide support to KLK Oleo’s production locations.

You will work within a team of scientists and chemists, participate in multidisciplinary, international projects, and report to the team leader R&D Specialties.#### **Verantwoordelijkheidsgebieden / Kerntaken**
**Responsibility areas/Core tasks**
* Coordinating and/or executing (literature) research programs in response to internal and external customer questions
* Staying up-to-date and share relevant developments within your field of expertise
* Introducing (innovative) sustainable products and processes
* Coordinating and performing specialistic laboratory research, including (ad hoc) practical work
* Developing, maintaining and propagating relevant developments within the specialism
* Developing/optimizing products/processes and methods/techniques
* Interpretating and reporting of research data/results to stakeholders
* Participating in strategical discussions and meetings, both internally and externally, with customers and partners
* Guiding and supervising production trial batches of new product developments
* Providing advice on (production) problems and guidance for troubleshooting activities, both internally and externally
* Identifying details/deviations to ensure adequate solutions and advice regarding problems
* Transferring knowledge to other parties involved in the form of oral and written reports, but also co-instruction and training
* Being a role model in our safety culture.
#### **Als kandidaat beschik je over de volgende kennis, ervaring en competenties**
**As a candidate you have the following knowledge, experience and competences
* Completed university education in organic chemistry (PhD)
* Living in the direct area of Delden (NL)
* Working experience (minimum 3 years) with new product development and organic synthesis, in industrial environment and scale-up
* Result-oriented with good analytical skills
* Skills to be able to work in a team as well as independently
* Communicative skills with excellent knowledge of the English language (Dutch is a pre)
* Excellent project (coordination) management skills
* Pro-active, broad and open minded, enthusiastic attitude.
#### **Wij bieden**
**What we offer you
* A challenging and rewarding work environment
* A all-in salary between € 70.000 and € 80.00 gross a year (depending on knowledge and experience and based on a full-time job)
* Opportunities to develop and grow in the position
* A good pension plan where we pay two thirds
* A vacation pay of 8.33%
* Travel reimbursement of € 0,23 net/km
* The possibility to work partly from home with a home work allowance of € 2.35/day
* A salary including a 13th month
* Generous (health) insurance benefits
* Fitness class once week during lunchtime and various other sport activities on a regular basis
* An active staff association that organizes regular fun outings throughout the year both with and without partners and/or family
* A total of 36.5 holiday leave and days per year.
**Information**
Candidates who meet the described profile can send a motivation letter with CV to the attention of Jill Melman, Recruiter (jill.melman@kolb.ch).
*An assessment can be part of the application procedure.*
*Acquisition after this vacancy is not appreciated.*#### **Over ons**

Met 480 medewerkers is KLK Kolb één van de leidende alkoxyleringsbedrijven in Europa en biedt een brede range van surfactants, chemische specialiteiten, chemicaliën voor de coatingindustrie en klant specifieke producten voor diverse markten. KLK Kolb is onderdeel van de KLK OLEO Groep. Wij verkopen onze producten wereldwijd en hebben op dit moment drie productiefaciliteiten in het hart van Europa (Hedingen-CH, Moerdijk-NL en Delden-NL). Wij onderscheiden ons door technisch hoogwaardige productie-installaties, een efficiënt en strak georganiseerde logistiek en talentvolle collega’s die kennis en ervaring uitwisselen met de klanten en overige vestigingen van KLK OLEO.",data scientist,https://t.gohiring.com/h/c5f595c5dc7587b0152ec2d4695c95ba4ab482a3d43f0ad45fbc0f6698b03594?source=Indeed,,,,,,,,,,,6e86ad2224cf7dcf,,en,,,

https://nl.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=d1be942f33351f02,indeed,Data Scientist II (Credit Risk),ABN AMRO,https://nl.indeed.com/cmp/Abn-Amro,"Amsterdam, NH, NL",,2024-07-24,,,,,True,,,,"Data Scientist II (Credit Risk)**In het kort**
Do you, like us, have the ambition to structurally bring Finance & Risk data management to a higher level? And do you enjoy enabling change and defining future proof processes?
In this role you can develop yourself in a professional as well as a personal way.
**Je werk**

The sub-team focusing on ESG Data has been active for almost a year. As a member of this team, the goal is to collaboratively build an ESG Data platform with IT Developers to supply the team involved in Sustainable Finance Regulation Modelling with the necessary data to monitor ESG risk.

Given the significance that regulatory authorities attribute to modelling and the underlying data, this role is challenging and impactful. The Sustainable Finance Regulation project is a new and excellent opportunity to become familiar with this development. Tasks related to this project, which involve building the platform, include:
* Inventory of the playing field with all stakeholders and parties involved
* Collection of all data requirements for the models
* Gap analysis of the data requirements for the SFR regulation and the data already available on the platform
* Planning of the delivery of the required data
* Actual delivery of dataset to the consumers.

Once the platform is ready, you will be involved in the data collection process. Your duties will encompass technical aspects such as SQL and Python programming, performing Data Quality analyses, and integrating datasets. Simultaneously, you'll be working on documentation and utilizing your communicative skills for stakeholder alignment. Active participation in frequent team meetings, where knowledge-sharing and progress transparency are key, is also expected. In this role, everything revolves around data modelling, along with related activities:
* Discussing data requirements for different ESG risk models and reports with the modellers and reporting analysts
* Make an inventory of the relevant databases within the bank and gain access to them
* Combine tables (merge / link) and aggregate data in SQL and Python
* Apply Data Quality Analysis, for example, course over time, missing values, extreme values
* Investigate the plausibility of the new data
* Document the data sourcing process and descriptive statistics and discuss this with the business parties

* Additionally, there are many ad hoc activities, and you will regularly participate in cross-departmental projects. Your ability and willingness to collaborate are crucial for success in this role. You naturally take initiative, organize work effectively, and eagerly work with others to deliver tangible results. You possess a practical, analytical approach and strong communication and presentation skills. Being a robust team player, you take responsibility for your work. In the dynamic environment in which you operate, you have the ability to get all stakeholders on board.
Some of the 'tools of the trade' you will use in this position include SQL, SAS, Python, Azure platform, and Databricks.**Werkomgeving**

The Finance & Risk Data Domain is part of Finance & Risk Business Grids (F&RBG), and plays an active role for all the Finance and Risk departments. We employ 250+ international professionals with different backgrounds who are driven to bring risk data management to a structurally higher level. Our aim is to generate reliable risk data on time. We do this by improving the risk data itself, data systems and data processes. We work with an Agile operating model. Our Data Department Finance & Risk consists of 5 teams where the atmosphere is dynamic, open and informal.

You will work in the Data Governance & Compliance department as part of the F&R Data Value Chain team. Like the other teams, yours will largely consist of young, driven professionals. The atmosphere is open and informal. We work hard, but there’s plenty of room for enjoyment!
**Je profiel**

Your ability and willingness to work with others are crucial for your success in this role. You are naturally someone who takes initiative, structures and organises work well and is keen to work with others to deliver tangible results. You are practical, have an analytical approach and have good communication and presentation skills. You are a strong team player, and you take responsibility for your work. In the dynamic environment in which you operate, you have the ability to get all stakeholders on board.

In this position, you learn a lot about the bank, departments, systems and products. Therefore, this position is a great starting point if you want to develop further in the direction of quantitative modelling. After one or two years, you have the opportunity to grow towards modelling.
Some of the 'tools of the trade' you will use in this position: SQL, Python, Azure platform, Databricks.
**Wij bieden**
* The gross monthly salary displayed above is based on a 36-hour work week, including vacation pay and benefit budget.

* The Benefit Budget is 11% of your salary. The Benefit Budget allows you to acquire additional employment benefits. If you make no purchases or reservations in the Benefit Shop in a given month, you are paid one twelfth of your Benefit Budget that month.
* Five weeks of vacation per year. You have the option to purchase an additional four weeks per year.
* Personal development Budget of € 1,000 per year, which you can accumulate up to € 3,000.
* Possibility to work from home (in consultation with your team and depending on your position).
* An annual public transport pass with free public transportation throughout the Netherlands (also for private use).
* An excellent pension scheme.
**Interesse?**
**Gelijke kansen voor iedereen**
